moves.name: Ember
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: Keep it Up!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Speed. Makes the user gradually heal itself.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.effect: Removes the frozen condition from the user. The user also takes 25% of the damage it dealt to the target. Has a very small chance of leaving the target burned.

passives.name: Standfast 3
passives.description: Reduces recoil damage received from using moves that have recoil in the effect tag.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up moves in a pinch.
